page.title: 01The Alton Block
page.content: Our block includes,in the south east,most of the town of Alton,in the south west,the village of Beech,and in the remainder,mainly farmland and woodland. The text concentrates on Alton and its people: their recreation and entertainment in the town; home life, use of transport and migration to Alton from elsewhere. The text also looks at health, some popular children's games, celebrations and at the village of Beech. The town of Alton, amid farmland and woodland, has a population of about 15,000 people.It has a direct electric rail service to Waterloo, London, and bus services to larger towns such as Guildford, Basingstoke and Southampton.It is a pleasant mixture of old and new.
